ratings.comment: I hate this guy so much he can eat my poo because he is way to difficult to work with and I do not like him

Ohyun Kwon is definitely the best TA I have ever had. He is very knowledgeable and friendly. His discussion section is both interesting and helpful, especially the review session which truly helps you a lot to prepare for the exam. If you are going to take Econ 102 in the future, I will recommend Ohyun Kwon the best!!!!!!
If you have a chance, just take him! You won't regret!
Ohyun is the best TA I have ever seen in econ department.

Ohyun is by far the best TA I will ever have here at UW. He genuinely cares about the academic success in each of his students. He provides extra resources that compliment both lecture and the textbook and really give a thorough understanding of the material. Better yet, the man is a Chelsea fan! Any student who receives Ohyun is very fortunate!

Ohyun was the BEST T.A. I have ever had at Madison. Not only is he really smart, but he is able to relate the information to the students in an easy way for all of us to understand. He prepares the best handouts for his students, which don't even compare to other TA's handouts. His main goal is to see all his students succeed.
Honestly Ohyun Kwon is the best TA at UW - Madison. Make this guy a professor ASAP he's that good

Ohyun was one of the best TA's I have had in college. He was always prepared in discussion section with useful material and always answered questions. He was extremely reliable when responding to quick questions via email (would respond in 10 minutes or less usually) and was always extremely helpful in office hours. He prepared a class notes handou

Ohyun will put all your other TA's and professors to shame. He really cares about his students, is nothing short of brilliant, goes above and beyond and can convey concepts better than any other instructor I've had. He was so much better than the other instructors, most students bailed on their TA's and went to his discussion instead.

TA prepares for the discussion so well!!!!!! He is amazingly responsible and I even  can't imagine how much time he put on the discussion. He help review the material in an organized way and try to cover as much as he can; good summary of the exam strategy and provide with many helpful suggestions
The best econ TA in Wisconsin!
